reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress gorgeous and perfect for garden weddings, appreciating its flattering cut and stretchy material. The fit receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it's suitable for petite bodies, while another mentions the length is appropriate for their height. The fabric comfort and quality receive mixed reviews - while some find it comfortable and of good quality, others mention the tulle is slightly itchy and the material feels harsh. items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flirty, fun, and still formal
items.body: I’m 5’11” and wear a 2x. This dress was true to size and flattering (I thought). My teen daughter said I looked like I was going to a funeral. I thought it was stylish, the see-through fabric fun and flirty, and the sweetheart neckline was adorable. the material was light and comfortable, and the stitching was normal. However, I ended up going with a dress a little more fun for the event I was going to. Instead of returning the dress, I gave it to my friend who was also going to the same event. She’s 5’4” and also a 2x. This dress was STUNNING on her. Read more
items.author: Rebecca H

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best dress and fit!
items.body: I never review BUT this dress was not only beautiful and well made. It’s true to size and so flattering! I received compliments literally all night. I felt so beautiful and confident. Seriously an amazing buy for any size or shape! For reference. I’m 5’2 and 173lbs. Read more
items.author: Ashley

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shoulders may need altering but dress is beautiful!
items.body: Lovely dress and fabric, and the bust fit me as I am a DD, but the shoulders slip right off. If you are handy you can probably adjust that issue. So, if you love the style just remember this is generously cut in the bust and oversized on shoulders, and I am broad shouldered. If you normally wear a 2XL I suggest you try sizing up a size. Read more
items.author: Jonilisa

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Party Dress
items.body: This dress is true to size and beautiful but the only thing is the once you were it (when I tried it on), it itches. Dress was steamed but it did not help. Quality, I think it should say the material was a bit ruff. But other than that I love the dress. Read more
items.author: Chely

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So beautiful and classic
items.body: I absolutely LOVE the design I received!! I ordered the off-the-shoulder dress which had a disclaimer that they’d be randomly sending one of two designs they have for the top. I received the satin-finish looking one and it has subtle little butterflies on it which was so pretty. I really like that the back of it was that stretchy fabric, too. I am plus size but I don’t have the typical plus size proportions (small cup size but wide hips) so I had to order a size 2x to accommodate for that. The top of the dress is a few inches too large for my measurements but it’s easy to tailor the top. I do think that this type of cut on the top is best suited for the girls with larger boobs lol. The skirt of the dress is beautiful! I would just want to be careful about snags and tears because of the lacey fabric. It also looks nice that the underskirt is shorter than the lace skirt! I’m wearing it with a black scarf tied around my waist in the photo, so just know that’s not part of the actual dress! Read more
items.author: Amira

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars stretchy, roomy in the top
items.body: Super cute, too large in the bust going to size down. Itchy on the back but could be solved with some lining on the scratchy lace parts. Really cute style. Read more
items.author: Meg

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color is way off
items.body: The dress itself is very pretty, but the color is definitely off. I ordered navy and it 1000% is absolutely black. Read more
items.author: Cat

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not good quality,itchy, and heavy
items.body: The dress was very pretty but it is not worth the price. The under skirt was that cheap “satin” material and the flower detail was itchy. I’m also a large chested girl currently breastfeeding on top of it and the bra I would’ve had to wear to make the girls look good was suffocating. I would also not recommend for warmer weather as it is very heavy. Read more
items.author: Chris Gros

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi Cocktail is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Formal Maxi Cocktail is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Off Shoulder Black, Pink, White, Blue, Black, Off Shoulder - Light Apricot, Off Shoulder - Navy. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
